entry.value:
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets
def flowFile = session.get() if(!flowFile) return
flowFile = session.write(flowFile, {inputStream, outputStream -> inputStream.eachLine { line -> a = line.tokenize('|') lat = a[8] lng = a[9]
fmt_addr = (new groovy.json.JsonSlurper()).parseText( new URL("https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/geocode/json?latlng=$lat,$lng&key=${googleApiKey.value}").text) .results[0].formatted_address
outputStream.write("$line$fmt_addr|".toString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) } } as StreamCallback)
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

processGroups.name: Capture Events from All Trucking Telemetry Devices

processors.name: Stream Processing Cluster - Truck Speed Event
Stream Processing Cluster - Truck Event Stream
